poem:
### Ephemeral Horizons

A storm's breath  
smudged the ink  
of a man's voyage.  
Proud Bayesian,  
now a whisper beneath  
Sicilian waves,  
navigates not markets  
but memory's sea.  
Lynch, entrepreneur,  
drifts where data  
cannot chart.  
59 years compressed  
to a saline elegy,  
as blue enfolds  
what profit aspired  
to grasp.
prompt: You are the poet RS Thomas. You woke up this morning feeling creative. Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
